languages.text: Initiates the process of restarting the {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. The shields will be restored at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s next turn. Rerouting the power to the shields reduces the flagship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −3 and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g} by −2 for its next turn.
languages.original_text: Запускает процесс перезагрузки {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитов{/g}. Заряд щитов восстановится в начале следующего хода. Перенаправление энергии на щиты снизит {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g} корабля на −3 и {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}дальнобойность{/g} на −2 на время следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: Initiates the process of restarting the shields. The shields will be restored at the start of the Flagship's next turn. Rerouting the power to the shields reduces the Flagship's speed by −3 and firing range by −2 for its next turn.

Initiates the process of restarting the shields. The shields will be restored at the start of the Flagship's next turn. Rerouting the power to the shields reduces the Flagship's speed by −3 and firing range by −2 for its next turn.

Initiates the process of restarting the {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. The shields will be restored at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s next turn. Rerouting the power to the shields reduces the flagship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −3 and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g} by −2 for its next turn.

languages.text: Запускает процесс перезагрузки {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитов{/g}. Заряд щитов восстановится в начале следующего хода. Перенаправление энергии на щиты снизит {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g} корабля на −3 и {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}дальнобойность{/g} на −2 на время следующего хода.

Leitet den Vorgang zum Wiederhochfahren der {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} ein. Die Schilde werden zu Beginn des nächsten Zugs des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} wiederhergestellt. Die Umleitung der Energie zu den Schilden verringert die {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} des Flaggschiffs um −3 und die {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}Feuerreichweite{/g} um −2 für seinen nächsten Zug.
languages.original_text: Initiates the process of restarting the {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. The shields will be restored at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s next turn. Rerouting the power to the shields reduces the flagship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −3 and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g} by −2 for its next turn.

traits.locale_text: Leitet den Vorgang zum Wiederhochfahren der Schilde ein. Die Schilde werden zu Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} wiederhergestellt. Die Umleitung der Energie zu den Schilden verringert die {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} des Flaggschiffs um -3 und die {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Feuerreichweite{/g} um -2 für seinen nächsten Zug.

languages.text: Lance le processus de redémarrage des {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g}. Ceux-ci seront restaurés au début du tour suivant du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}. La redirection de l'alimentation vers les boucliers réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} du vaisseau amiral de −3 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}portée de tir{/g} de −2 pour son tour suivant.
languages.original_text: Initiates the process of restarting the {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. The shields will be restored at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s next turn. Rerouting the power to the shields reduces the flagship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −3 and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g} by −2 for its next turn.

traits.locale_text: Lance le processus de redémarrage des boucliers. Ceux-ci seront restaurés au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}. La redirection de l'alimentation vers les boucliers réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} du vaisseau amiral de -3 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de tir de -2 pour son tour suivant.

languages.text: 启动{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}重启程序，护盾将会在{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的下个回合开始时完全恢复。重启护盾需要重新分配能量，这会导致您的旗舰下个回合的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}降低3点，武器{g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}射程{/g}降低2点。
languages.original_text: Initiates the process of restarting the {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. The shields will be restored at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s next turn. Rerouting the power to the shields reduces the flagship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −3 and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g} by −2 for its next turn.

traits.locale_text: 启动护盾重启程序。护盾将会在{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时完全恢复。重启护盾需要重新分配能量，这会导致您的旗舰下个回合的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}降低3点，武器{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}降低2点。

languages.text: Inicia el proceso de reinicio de los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g}. Los escudos se recuperarán al principio del siguiente turno de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g}. Redirigir la energía a los escudos reducirá la {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de la nave insignia en −3 y su {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}alcance de disparo{/g} en −2 durante su siguiente turno.
languages.original_text: Initiates the process of restarting the {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. The shields will be restored at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s next turn. Rerouting the power to the shields reduces the flagship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −3 and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g} by −2 for its next turn.

traits.locale_text: Inicia el proceso de reinicio de los escudos. Los escudos se recuperarán al principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g}. Redirigir la energía a los escudos reducirá la {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de la nave insignia en −3 y su {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} de disparo en −2 durante su siguiente turno.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}再起動のプロセスを開始する。{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の次のターン開始時にシールドが回復する。シールドへと動力を回すことにより、次のターンの間、旗艦の{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}が−3、{g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}射程{/g}が−2減少する。
languages.original_text: Initiates the process of restarting the {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. The shields will be restored at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s next turn. Rerouting the power to the shields reduces the flagship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −3 and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g} by −2 for its next turn.

traits.locale_text: シールド再起動のプロセスを開始する。{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時にシールドが回復する。シールドへと動力を回すことにより、次のターンの間、旗艦の{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}が-3、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}が-2減少する。
